About Us
Inquire Now
LEGACY OF LEGENDS
Revitalizing the Course
Comprehensive renovation guided by Sanford Ferris Golf Design. Spearheaded by John Sanford, a past president of the American Society of Golf Course Architects.

Miles away from Stuart Beach

Holes of Golf
Inquire Now
Nestled within a gated, high-end community in Palm City, Palm Cove Golf offers an unparalleled blend of privacy and accessibility. Overlooking the picturesque St. Lucie River, the course features stunning water views from select holes, creating a serene and captivating experience. Located just 10 miles from Stuart Beach and directly across from the prestigious Floridian Golf Club, Palm Cove Golf is the closest golf course to the ocean in Palm City, making it a truly unique destination for golf enthusiasts seeking luxury and convenience.
A brief history of Palm Cove Golf
Preserving a Legacy, Shaping the Future
Palm Cove Golf has hosted legends of the game, including Jack Nicklaus, Arnold Palmer, and Chi Chi Rodriguez, each leaving their mark on our fairways. Today, under new ownership, we honor this rich legacy by transforming Palm Cove into an exclusive boutique private club experience for a new generation of members.
Inquire Now
Join Us
Ready to belong?
Discover the exclusivity, community, and excellence that set us apart. Ready to learn more? Contact us today and explore membership opportunities!

Memberships
Brochure
Inquire Now
Crafting a Refined Experience on Every Hole
Unfolding Now:
Vision 2025
Exclusive Golf
At Palm Cove, members have full access to a redesigned golf course that offers both challenge and enjoyment, creating a unique and memorable experience.
Dining Experience
Seasonal menus and attentive staff ensure every Palm Cove dining visit feels special. From casual meals with friends to celebrations, every moment is designed to impress and delight.
Served with Style
At Palm Cove, enjoy inspired dishes crafted for every taste in a welcoming setting. With indoor and outdoor spaces, every meal is a moment to savor and connect.
Discover a golf membership crafted for those who seek more than just a game – an invitation to an unparalleled course, exclusive events, and a vibrant affinity for leisure pursuits, shared by those who value excellence in every swing.
Inquire Now
Experience THe REAL TASTE
Culinary Moments
Your place at Palm Cove Golf awaits
Explore Membership Opportunities
We’re excited to welcome those with a true passion for golf, fine dining, and a vibrant community. By inquiring, you’re taking the first step toward joining an exclusive experience at Palm Cove Golf. Discover the meaning of belonging to a community built on connection, luxury, and the game you love.
ANSWERS TO YOUR QUESTIONS
FAQs
Find answers to common questions about memberships, amenities, and what makes Palm Cove Golf a unique place to belong.
Inquire Now
What makes Palm Cove Golf unique compared to other private clubs?
Palm Cove Golf offers an intimate, boutique experience with fewer members, ensuring unhurried play and personalized service. The club combines a rich history with modern enhancements, creating a private retreat tailored for connection, recreation, and relaxation.
Do I need to be an avid golfer to enjoy membership?
Not at all! While we cater to passionate golfers, Palm Cove Golf also provides exceptional dining, social events, and a vibrant community, perfect for those who enjoy connecting with others and savoring a luxury lifestyle.
Are there events and social gatherings for members?
Yes, we will be hosting a variety of events throughout the year, from dining events and themed social gatherings, designed to foster connection and create memorable experiences.
How does Palm Cove Golf support new members in connecting with the community?
We host a variety of welcome events, social gatherings, and group activities specifically designed to help new members get to know one another and feel at home within our community.
What amenities and facilities are available beyond the golf course?
In addition to golf, members have access to our exclusive dining venues, beautiful outdoor social spaces, and various events, all tailored to enhance the Palm Cove experience.
What improvements have been made?
Significant improvements are underway to transform Palm Cove Golf into an elevated, exclusive golfing experience. While some enhancements will continue through 2025, several key upgrades have already begun, including the full renovation of the pro shop and restaurant. Additional work in progress includes expanding the practice facility with new target greens, synthetic hitting bays, and a larger short game area. Tee complexes are being leveled and expanded, bunkers are being strategically relocated, and selective vegetation clearing has started to open up beautiful views across the course. Each update is carefully designed to refine and enrich the Palm Cove experience.
